Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Saw 3 blinking lights (would stay lit and then turn off completely). They were in closs proximity and then separated into different directions.
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside of my back door and looked up in the northern sky and saw three lights-about the size of stars. They would light up and then turn off. Then they separated into different directions. With lights turning on and off in short intervals. Then they disappeared altogether. I called my husband when I first saw them and he witnessed them also. They were an yellow-orangish color. At first I thought it they were planes or something and going through clouds. But there were no clouds and the stars were clearly visible. They were moving at a high rate of speed when the separated. At first they were hovering. I thought we should report the event to someone. So I just looked on line and found this site. I've never seen this type of thing before.
